original: 劉備對諸葛亮「君才十倍曹丕，必能安國，終定大事。若嗣子可輔，輔之；如其不才，君可自取。」
text: Liu Bei told Zhuge Liang, "A gentleman is ten times more talented than Cao Pi, and he will be able to stabilize the country and determine the final event. If heirs can be assisted, he can assist him; if he is not talented, he can choose himself."
